application.doc: Retrieve the list of configured Redis collections

method.name: GET
method.doc: To retrieve the list of configured Redis collections, issue an HTTP GET command on the Redis configuration resource URI.

param.name: Accept:application/json
param.doc: Required for requests to the service

representation.name: RedisListEntry
representation.doc: Note: Response body is an array.

param.name: name
param.doc: The name of the Redis collection.

param.name: last_modified
param.doc: The time that the configuration was last modified. The time is represented as a numerical number indicating the number of seconds since the Epoch (00:00:00 UTC, January 1, 1970).

response.doc: There is a problem with the request. The JSON message describes the problem.
File not Found, The requested service does not exist. The JSON message indicates which resource.
An internal error occurred. The JSON message indicates the problem.
